items.question: What is Genmoji?
items.answer: Genmoji is a new feature of Apple Intelligence that lets users create custom genmojis — called Genmoji. Genmoji is available on iOS 18.2 or later on iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, and all iPhone 16 models.

items.question: What is Genmoji Online?
items.answer: Genmoji Online is a website that allows you to create custom genmojis, similar to Apple's Genmoji, but without the need for an iOS device. You can generate unique genmojis using text-based prompts, and then use them on various social media platforms.

items.question: How is Genmoji Online different from Apple's Genmoji?
items.answer: The primary difference is that Genmoji Online is not limited to Apple devices. You can use it on any device with a web browser. Apple's Genmoji is a feature of Apple Intelligence and is only available on devices updated to iOS 18 or later. Our site aims to provide the same functionality but with broader accessibility. Second, Genmoji Online provides more features, such as the ability to create genmojis from images, and the ability to create genmojis with different styles like stickers, mascots, etc.

items.question: What technology does Genmoji Online use?
items.answer: Our site uses an image generation model, similar to Flux 1 Dev, which is fine-tuned using a large dataset of genmojis. We use a language model (LLM) to make your prompt more descriptive, which improves the quality of the generated image. We also use background removal and resizing processes similar to Apple's methods.

items.question: How do I create an genmoji on genmojionline.com?
items.answer: You create genmojis by typing a few words or a phrase into the "Describe an genmoji" box, or upload an image. The website uses this prompt to generate unique genmojis. Use simple, descriptive keywords for the best results, avoid long sentences.

items.question: What kind of prompts work best?
items.answer:
- Simple, descriptive prompts using keywords work best. Avoid long sentences
- You can specify colors, styles, and actions, such as "a red cat with a hat"
- Try adding the word "explosion" to create more dynamic and interesting genmojis

items.question: Can I use my own photos to create Genmoji?
items.answer:
Yes, you can use photos of yourself or others to create Genmoji by uploading the image to our website. You can also customize the person's clothing, actions and emotions in the prompt.

- The Feature is currently in beta and only available for a limited number of users.

items.question: Can I use the genmojis I create as stickers?
items.answer: Yes, the genmojis you generate can be used like stickers in messaging apps. In some apps, they may also appear like normal genmojis alongside text.

items.question: Are Genmoji genmojis free to use?
items.answer: Yes! All genmojis created with Genmoji Online are free to use. You retain full rights to your generated genmojis and can use them for personal or commercial purposes without attribution or copyright concerns.

items.question: Where can I use my Genmojis?
items.answer: Genmojis are compatible with all major platforms including Discord, Slack, WhatsApp, and social media. You can download them in various formats and use them anywhere you want to express yourself.

items.question: Why does my Genmoji look different from what I expected?
items.answer: Genmoji generation is creative and experimental, and sometimes you will not get the result you were hoping for. Keep swiping to see other options, or refine the prompt slightly. If using a photo of a person, ensure the photo is well-lit and focused. You can also use the editor to try different versions of the person in the photo.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.metaDescription: Read Genmoji Online's refund policy, including eligibility, how to request a refund, and processing details.

ourRefundPolicy.title: Our Refund Policy
ourRefundPolicy.description: At Genmoji Online, we strive to provide the best experience possible. We understand that circumstances may change, and you might need to request a refund. Please read our refund policy carefully before making a purchase.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
items: Time Limit: Refund requests must be made within 3 days of your purchase. After this period, we cannot process any refund requests.
Credit Usage: If you have used more than 50 credits, you are not eligible for a refund, regardless of the time since purchase.

howToRequest.title: How to Request a Refund
steps: Contact Us: Reach out to our support team at support@genmojionline.com.
Provide Details: Include your account details, order number, purchase date, and reason for the refund request.
Submit Within 3 Days: Ensure your request is submitted within 3 days of your purchase.

processing.title: Processing Refunds
processing.description: Once we receive your refund request, we will review it and notify you of the outcome soon. If approved, your refund will be processed to your original payment method.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to update our refund policy at any time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Genmoji Online ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our service.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We may collect the following types of information:

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected information to:

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
items: Legal authorities when required by law

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement security measures to protect your information, but no method is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us at support@genmojionline.com to exercise these rights.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this policy. Continued use of our service constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.description: For questions about this policy, contact us at support@genmojionline.com.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using Genmoji Online, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use our service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.description: Genmoji Online provides AI-powered genmoji generation services. Users can create custom genmojis based on text prompts.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
items: Use the service only for lawful purposes
Not create harmful or offensive content

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All genmojis generated through our service are released into the public domain. You can freely use, modify, copy, distribute, and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. No attribution is required.

usage.title: 4.1 Usage Rights
items: You can use the generated genmojis for any purpose
No attribution to Genmoji Online is required
You can modify and adapt the genmojis
You can share and redistribute the genmojis

limitations.title: 4.2 Limitations
limitations.description: While the genmojis themselves are free to use, the Genmoji Online name, logo, and service remain protected by applicable intellectual property laws. The service infrastructure, website design, and underlying technology remain the property of Genmoji Online.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Genmoji Online is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from service use.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of the State of California.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these terms, contact us at support@genmojionline.com.
